column5: Thank you, I donâ€™t have anyone to really help me out Iâ€™ve always done it on my own since my mother kicked me out when I was 15... and i donâ€™t have a father.. & If this man canâ€™t be here for me now then he doesnâ€™t need to be there for me if this were to ever occur again and I freaking hope not because this is all just too much Im only still alive because of my kids if it werenâ€™t for them Iâ€™d kill myself already....

So just I stopped taking them.. I have my first appointment with a psychiatrist next week and hoping that sheâ€™ll be able to help me...trust me your not the first person to sound like an a** and ask me this...so Iâ€™m not bothered, hell sometimes even I wonder why....

My moms the reason Iâ€™m this way and she denies TIL this day lol I wonder sometimes why didnâ€™t she just abort ğŸ™„ i didnâ€™t ask to be here ... !

I was in the same position as you a few weeks ago. I had no idea how to get help, or even what to do or who to call??? I was having really bad anxiety and my panic attacks became worst and more often as well as depression. So I called my doctor and he recommended I go to the ER so I go and they recommended I see a psychiatrist & to try therapy/groups since Iâ€™ve been through some trauma growing up. I would bring it up at your doctor visit, maybe he/she can give you options based on the the answers you give them. I was prescribed Zoloft.. but the side effects were so mild for me I just couldnâ€™t take it anymore so I stopped them he gave me a different kind but honestly the pills have just been sitting in my bathroom cabinet because Iâ€™m afraid of feeling extremely sick again .. my next plan is seeing a psychiatrist... so that they can tell me what is it thatâ€™s really â€œwrongâ€ with me I guess... your not alone itâ€™s up to you on how youâ€™ll make the first step into getting help and you already have because you know your not okay right now and want to get help... well done !

I was prescribed sertraline and hated the side effects, I was always dull 90% of the time! Itâ€™s like my mind tried to make me believe I was happy but I knew deep down inside I wasnâ€™t. I as well didnâ€™t feel any emotions everythingâ€™s just dull, all I ever wanted to do was sleep... perhaps your doctor can prescribe you a different medication?
